definitions: in a fierce, violent, and uncontrolled manner

examples.text: a schoolgirl has been savagely attacked by a dog

shortDefinitions: in fierce, violent, and uncontrolled manner

examples.text: he savagely criticized the Prime Minister

definitions: to a very great and severe degree

examples.text: corporations have savagely cut costs to boost profits
civil liberties would be savagely affected

shortDefinitions: to very great and severe degree
